quiz.question: What is the main objective of the Job Scheduling problem?
options: Schedule jobs to maximize profit given deadlines
quiz.answer: Schedule jobs to maximize profit given deadlines

hackerrank_problems.title: Job Sequencing Problem
hackerrank_problems.description: Schedule jobs with deadlines and profits to maximize total profit using greedy approach.

hackerrank_problems.title: Maximum Profit Scheduling
hackerrank_problems.description: Solve weighted job scheduling to select non-overlapping jobs for maximum profit.

hackerrank_problems.title: Weighted Job Scheduling
hackerrank_problems.description: Use DP to schedule jobs with start and end times and maximize total profit.
